Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with delays near Western due to earlier track work.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with delays near Western due to earlier track work.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Perry
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Wentworth, 71st, Vincennes and 69th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Wentworth, 71st, Vincennes and 69th due to street blockage near 69th/Perry.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
